bibl.title: Law in the Documents of the Judaean Desert.

series.title: Supplements to the Journal for the Study of Judaism.

bibl.note: 12 studies presented in an Israel Science Fund Workshop on Law in the Documents from the Judaean Desert at Bar-Ilan University in 1998. - Pp. 1-6: R.K. and D.S., Introduction; - 237-241: Index of Passages [including papyrus and inscriptions]; - 242-244: Index of Names.
bibl.seg: KATZOFF Ranon and David SCHAPS (Edd.), Law in the Documents of the Judaean Desert. (Supplements to the Journal for the Study of Judaism. 96.)

12 studies presented in an Israel Science Fund Workshop on Law in the Documents from the Judaean Desert at Bar-Ilan University in 1998. - Pp. 1-6: R.K. and D.S., Introduction; - 237-241: Index of Passages [including papyrus and inscriptions]; - 242-244: Index of Names.

C.R. par Timothy H. Lim, JThS N.S., 57 (2006) pp. 627-629. - Hans-Albert Rupprecht, SCI 26 (2007) pp. 243-245. - Jean A. Straus, AntCl 75 (2006) pp. 500-502. - Arthur Verhoogt, BASP 43 (2006) pp. 189-191.
